snippet: Silvio Denz is founder and chairman of Art & Fragrance, a developer and producer of perfumes. The company also owns the crystal maker Lalique.
lead_paragraph: Silvio Denz is founder and chairman of Art & Fragrance, a developer and producer of perfumes. The company also owns the crystal maker Lalique.

headline.main: Covering the Skill Basics at Big Companies
